name: Banana Oatmeal Cookies Recipe
description: Banana Oatmeal Cookies. Gluten-free Banana Oatmeal Breakfast Cookies with Chocolate chips. 1 Bowl 20 minute Banana Cookies. Vegan Gluten-free Oil-free Recipe. Makes 10 to 12 cookies
recipeIngredient: 2 to 3 tbsp raw or coconut sugar  (or use stevia or other sweetener)
2 tbsp smooth almond butter ( or peanut butter)
1 cup old fashioned oats (use certified gluten-free if needed)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F / 190ºc
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F / 190ºc

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mash the banana really well. Add the rest of the ingredients and mix until fully combined.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, mash the banana really well. Add the rest of the ingredients and mix until fully combined.

recipeInstructions.text: I usually warm the entire bowl by keeping it near the oven (or microwave for a few seconds) to help the nut butter mix in faster.
recipeInstructions.name: I usually warm the entire bowl by keeping it near the oven (or microwave for a few seconds) to help the nut butter mix in faster.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the almond flour, coconut flour, starch, baking soda, baking powder and salt and mix in.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the almond flour, coconut flour, starch, baking soda, baking powder and salt and mix in.

recipeInstructions.text: Add oats and chocolate chips and mix in. At this point you can also add cranberries, nuts chopped small, seeds, candied ginger etc.
recipeInstructions.name: Add oats and chocolate chips and mix in. At this point you can also add cranberries, nuts chopped small, seeds, candied ginger etc.

recipeInstructions.text: Oil or flour your hands and make flat cookies from the mixture and place on parchment lined baking sheet.
recipeInstructions.name: Oil or flour your hands and make flat cookies from the mixture and place on parchment lined baking sheet.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 13 to 15 minutes until almost all golden. Cool completely and store in an airtight container on the counter for upto 2 days or refrigerated for upto a week..
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 13 to 15 minutes until almost all golden. Cool completely and store in an airtight container on the counter for upto 2 days or refrigerated for upto a week..
